headline: GTA Online
subtitle: This Weekâ€™s Prize Ride: The Grotti Itali GTO
content:
LS Car Meet members who manage to reach the podium and place in the Top 3 in 5 LS Car Meet Races will receive the keys to a Grotti Itali GTO to race and spruce up as they see fit.

To unlock access to the LS Car Meet, head over to see Mimi in Cypress Flats. You can find her location by locating the LS Car Meet icon on the GTA Online Map.
